mapper.update: /* alpass.ipt.car.bnwrhs.expcmdtbrng.mapper.CarEptExpcmdtbrngMapper.updateExpcmdtbrngAudtForEpt */ UPDATE ALPASSEXT.TB_CARE_EXP_CMDT_BRNG SET PRCS_STTS_CD = DECODE(#{audtPtCd}, 'O', 'D08', 'D09') , PRCS_DTTM = TO_DATE(#{audtDttm}, 'DDMMYYYYHH24MISS') , LAST_CHPR_ID = #{lastChprId} , LAST_CHG_DTTM = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE EXP_CMDT_BRNG_RQNO = #{expCmdtBrngRqno} /** N° demande de l'introduction des marchandises à exporter !== 수출물품반입신청번호 ==! */

/* alpass.ipt.car.bnwrhs.expcmdtbrng.mapper.CarEptExpcmdtbrngMapper.updateRelaNo */ UPDATE ALPASSEXT.TB_CARE_EXP_CMDT_BRNG SET RELA_NO = #{relaNo} /** Numéro Concerné !== 관련번호 ==! */ , LAST_CHPR_ID = #{lastChprId} /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , LAST_CHG_DTTM = SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ WHERE EXP_CMDT_BRNG_RQNO = #{expCmdtBrngRqno} /** N° demande de l'introduction des marchandises à exporter !== 수출물품반입신청번호 ==! */
